scripts.build-common: scripts/build.sh requests && scripts/build.sh serviceLogs && cpx "src/dna/**/*.json" build/dna && cp -r src/test build/test
scripts.build: mkdir build; rm -rf build/*; npm run build-common
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd build && hcdev web
scripts.watch: scripts/build.sh requests -w & scripts/build.sh serviceLogs -w & rm -rf build/test && ln -s ../src/test build/test
scripts.test: npm run build && cd build/test && hcdev test
